review: It connects to everything like it's supposed to and it definitely has a better interface and search tool than the alternatives, but it takes forever to start up (drawing power from the TV through a USB, I haven't tried it with the power cord to the wall).  The remote is a little sluggish to respond.Make sure you look at how long it is before you buy it!  It's pretty long.  I bough it for my bedroom TV and it just barely fits between the TV and the wall, and it wouldn't fit into my living room TV at all.

review: Bought as a present at first but ended up buying a second one for myself!  Access to Netflix and Amazon Instant Prime is a given, but it also has a huge selection of other free channels I watch regularly like German News (Tageschau), various yoga classes, knitting classes (SheruKnitting) and public access channels.  Was previously streaming via my Panasonic Blu-Ray player - but this is much better!  Still using my Panasonic on my older 20" tube TV since the input is not compatible with Roku.  Great value!
